definitions.definition: an asset or object bought or obtained, typically by a library or museum.
examples: purchase, buy, gain, accession, addition, investment, possession the boat is a new acquisition

definitions.definition: an act of purchase of one company by another.
examples: there were many acquisitions among travel agents

definitions.definition: buying or obtaining an asset or object.
examples: Western culture places a high value on material acquisition

definitions.definition: the learning or developing of a skill, habit, or quality.
